item.title: Gluglug Libreboot X200
item.description: The Gluglug Libreboot X200 is a lightweight, durable and freedom-friendly laptop with a 12.1 inch screen powered by a 2.26 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo P8400 processor.

item.title: Lenovo ThinkPad Yoga 11e Chromebook
item.description: The ThinkPad Yoga 11e is a Chromebook by Lenovo first released in June 2014. As most Chromebooks, it is targeted at the education market.
